alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Coastal Camden; Echols; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 8:28AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Nassau, northern Hamilton, Camden, Echols, southeastern Ware, southeastern Clinch and central Charlton Counties through 900 AM EDT... At 828 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles east of Kings Bay Base to Jennings. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Hilliard, Folkston, Woodbine, Jennings, Fargo, Statenville, Kings Bay Base and Stephen Foster State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Clinch; Coastal Camden; Echols; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
